C

classifier - package classifier
Contains classes and interfaces necessary to build classifiers and evaluate their performance.
Classifier - Interface in classifier
Root interface in the classifier hierarchy.
ClassifierMetrics - Class in classifier
Implements a measurer of a Classifier performance
ClassifierMetrics(Classifier, Dataset, Dataset) - Constructor for class classifier.ClassifierMetrics
Creates a new Classifier Metrics Constructor used to train the classifier and test it and get appropriate measures of performance
classify(Dataset) - Method in class classifier.AbstractBayesianNetworkClassifier
Classify a whole test dataset with the classifier
classify(Dataset) - Method in interface classifier.Classifier
Classify a whole test dataset with the classifier
classify(Instance) - Method in class classifier.AbstractBayesianNetworkClassifier
Classify an instance with the classifier
classify(Instance) - Method in interface classifier.Classifier
Classify an instance with the classifier
classValue - Variable in class dataset.DefaultInstance
 
computeClassOFE(int) - Method in class classifier.AbstractBayesianNetworkClassifier
Computes the observed frequency estimates for the class (theta_c) where the class takes the value c
computeJointProbabilityD(Instance, int) - Method in class classifier.AbstractBayesianNetworkClassifier
Computes the joint probability distribution of a given instance i, for a class value of c
computeN() - Method in class classifier.AbstractBayesianNetworkClassifier
Compute number of instances in the train set
computeNc(int) - Method in class classifier.AbstractBayesianNetworkClassifier
Compute number of instances in the train set where the class takes the value c
computeNijkc(Attribute, Attribute, int, int, int) - Method in class classifier.AbstractBayesianNetworkClassifier
Compute number of instances in the train set where the attribute i takes the value k, the attribute i_prime takes the value j and the class takes the value c.
computeNikc(Attribute, int, int) - Method in class classifier.AbstractBayesianNetworkClassifier
Compute number of instances in the train set where the attribute i takes the value k and the class takes the value c.
computeOFE(Attribute, Attribute, int, int, int) - Method in class classifier.AbstractBayesianNetworkClassifier
Computes the observed frequency estimates (theta_ijkc) for attribute i, whose parent is i_parent, where i takes the value k, i_parent takes the value j and the class takes the value c
computeWeight(Attribute, Attribute) - Method in class classifier.AbstractBayesianNetworkClassifier
Computes the weight between two attributes
